      • createQuestion

        public Question createQuestion(Event event,
                               java.lang.String question,
                               float betMinimum)
                        throws EventFinished,
                               QuestionAlreadyExist
        This method creates a question for an event, with a question text and the minimum bet
        Specified by:
        createQuestion in interface BLFacade
        Parameters:
        event - to which question is added
        question - text of the question
        betMinimum - minimum quantity of the bet
        Returns:
        the created question, or null, or an exception
        Throws:
        EventFinished - if current data is after data of the event
        QuestionAlreadyExist - if the same question already exists for the event

      • getEvents

        public java.util.Vector<Event> getEvents(java.util.Date date)
        This method invokes the data access to retrieve the events of a given date
        Specified by:
        getEvents in interface BLFacade
        Parameters:
        date - in which events are retrieved
        Returns:
        collection of events

      • initializeBD

        public void initializeBD()
        This method invokes the data access to initialize the database with some events and questions. It is invoked only when the option "initialize" is declared in the tag dataBaseOpenMode of resources/config.xml file
        Specified by:
        initializeBD in interface BLFacade
